scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm firmament shrouded in clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effects

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, misty immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, drifting spiritual motes, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第10集:营地密谋·黑凤追踪。

scenes.description: 方夫人木屋内众人落座,韩立抱着熟睡女童进门。

visual.composition: Inside Madam Fang’s cabin the group sits as Han Li enters carrying the sleeping girl
visual.character_pose: Han Li holding the sleeping child

scenes.prompt: Inside Madam Fang’s cabin the others sit while Han Li walks in cradling the sleeping girl.
scenes.narration: 韩立携女童回营,方夫人、秦师兄等人齐聚木屋。

scenes.description: 方夫人与秦师兄讨论四波兽潮来历,眉头紧锁。

visual.composition: Madam Fang and Senior Brother Qin discuss the origin of the four beast tides with furrowed brows

scenes.prompt: Madam Fang and Senior Brother Qin trade theories about the four waves of beast tides, both visibly tense.
scenes.narration: 二人皆疑此次兽潮背后另有高阶妖兽操纵，事有蹊跷。

scenes.description: 韩立听闻三境修士如云,微感震撼。

visual.composition: Han Li hears there are countless cultivators in the three realms and looks slightly shaken

scenes.prompt: Han Li listens to tales of cities teeming with cultivators and can’t help feeling awed.
scenes.narration: 听闻大城日有百万修士往来，他也暗自咋舌，大为震撼。

scenes.description: 赵府老管家与婢女奔入屋内,黛儿惊喜扑入怀中。

visual.composition: The Zhao estate steward and maid rush in as Dai’er leaps into their arms

scenes.prompt: The old steward and maid from the Zhao household dash inside, Dai’er squealing as she leaps into their embrace.
scenes.narration: 老管家带婢女赶到,黛儿含泪投怀,众人皆松气。

scenes.description: 方夫人与秦师兄向韩立说明七叶阴血芝的计划。

visual.composition: Madam Fang and Senior Brother Qin outline the Seven-Leaf Yin Blood Ganoderma plan to Han Li

scenes.prompt: Madam Fang and Senior Brother Qin brief Han Li on the scheme to seize the Seven-Leaf Yin Blood Ganoderma.
scenes.narration: 他们坦陈妖兽巢穴藏有阴血芝,需韩立破除金行禁制。

scenes.description: 秦师兄提出九玄明玉潭作为报酬,韩立沉吟。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qin mentions the Jiuxuan Bright Jade Pool as payment while Han Li ponders

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qin offers the Jiuxuan Bright Jade Pool as payment, leaving Han Li thoughtful.
scenes.narration: 九玄明玉潭可助炼体突破,让韩立不得不心动。

scenes.description: 秦师兄等人交出灵心佩作保证,韩立接过查看。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qin and the others hand over Spirit Heart Tokens while Han Li inspects them

scenes.prompt: They place the Spirit Heart Tokens on the table and Han Li picks them up to inspect.
scenes.narration: 四枚灵心佩摆在案上,他确定其内含魂力,终于点头。

scenes.description: 众人散去后,韩立独坐小屋,思量金刚诀突破。

visual.composition: After the others depart, Han Li sits alone in the hut contemplating his next Vajra breakthrough

scenes.prompt: After everyone leaves, Han Li sits alone in the cabin pondering how to advance the Vajra Art.
scenes.narration: 夜深人静,他端详玉佩,暗估九玄明玉潭的价值。

scenes.description: 第二日傍晚营地骚动,赵城主惊鸿一瞥现身。

visual.composition: The camp stirs at dusk on the second day as City Lord Zhao makes a fleeting appearance

scenes.prompt: At sunset on the second day the camp erupts as City Lord Zhao appears in a flash.
scenes.narration: 营地传出赵城主归来的消息,引得众人纷纷围观。

scenes.description: 赵城主与黛儿拜别众人,韩立静观。

visual.composition: City Lord Zhao and Dai’er bow to everyone in farewell while Han Li watches quietly

scenes.prompt: City Lord Zhao and Dai’er take their leave while Han Li observes in silence.
scenes.narration: 赵城主当面道谢,还送上金刚诀线索,准备启程离开。

scenes.description: 韩立接过短剑信物,神情凝重。

visual.composition: Han Li receives the short-sword token with a solemn expression
visual.character_pose: Han Li holding the short sword

scenes.prompt: Han Li takes the short-sword keepsake, his face grave.
scenes.narration: 得知可求取金刚诀六层心得,他郑重收下短剑。

scenes.description: 狻狼突然狂跳,赵城主腿部黑芒一闪镇住。

visual.composition: The suanni wolf suddenly leaps wildly until black light flashes from the city lord’s leg to subdue it

scenes.prompt: The suanni wolf erupts into a frenzy, only to be suppressed by a black gleam from Zhao City Lord’s leg.
scenes.narration: 座狼突暴走,他以诡异黑芒压制,韩立暗自心惊。

scenes.description: 赵城主队伍消失在夜色,韩立凝望沉思。

visual.composition: City Lord Zhao’s group vanishes into the night as Han Li gazes after them thoughtfully
visual.character_pose: Han Li staring into the distance

scenes.prompt: City Lord Zhao’s retinue disappears into the night while Han Li watches, deep in thought.
scenes.narration: 他目送队伍远去，隐约察觉赵城主气息诡异，心生疑虑。

scenes.description: 韩立独自离开营地,夜色中身形忽隐忽现。

visual.composition: Han Li leaves camp alone, his silhouette flickering in and out of the night

scenes.prompt: Han Li departs the camp in secret, his figure phasing in and out of the moonlight.
scenes.narration: 他暗叹一声，决意亲自查清真相，悄然遁去追踪。

scenes.description: 赵城主等人骑乘狻狼狂奔,韩立远远跟随。

visual.composition: City Lord Zhao and his men race on suanni wolves across the wasteland while Han Li tails them from afar
visual.character_pose: Han Li shadowing at a distance

scenes.prompt: Zhao’s group rides their suanni wolves at full tilt while Han Li follows from far behind.
scenes.narration: 荒野之上，狻狼狂奔，韩立默默吊在远处，保持距离。

scenes.description: 赵城主抵达土丘停下,众人困惑环顾。

visual.composition: Zhao City Lord halts atop a mound while his followers glance around in confusion

scenes.prompt: Zhao City Lord reins in at a low hill, leaving his men puzzled as they look around.
scenes.narration: 深入百里，他忽然勒住坐骑，手下面面相觑，不明所以。

scenes.description: 土丘裂开巨口,狻狼与骑士被吞噬。

visual.composition: The hill splits into a massive maw that devours a suanni and rider

scenes.prompt: The mound yawns open like a giant mouth, swallowing rider and wolf alike.
scenes.narration: 突然地面崩裂，一骑连人带狼瞬间没入深坑，惨遭不测。

scenes.description: 赵城主冷笑施展妖异手法,其余护卫惨遭近身击杀。

visual.composition: City Lord Zhao smirks and unleashes eerie arts, cutting down the remaining guards at close range

scenes.prompt: City Lord Zhao sneers and employs sinister techniques, butchering the rest of his escorts up close.
scenes.narration: 紫袍大汉脸露阴厉，一出手便把心腹屠戮殆尽，心狠手辣。

scenes.description: 韩立隐藏暗处,目光冰冷注视异变。

visual.composition: Han Li hides in the shadows, eyes cold as he watches the bizarre transformation

scenes.prompt: Han Li stays hidden, gazing icily at the unfolding treachery.
scenes.narration: 暗处的韩立冷眼旁观，心知此人绝非本尊，定是假冒。

scenes.description: 土丘下冥雾翻涌,未知妖邪苏醒。

visual.composition: Under the mound, ghostly mist surges as an unknown evil awakens

scenes.prompt: Beneath the hill, nether mist churns and some unknown fiend begins to stir.
scenes.narration: 深坑冥雾翻滚，似有更大阴谋在夜色中浮现，暗藏杀机。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.environment: Night sky, immortal city outline, drifting spirit particles
visual.fx: Spiritual motes falling with a fade-out

scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第11集即将开始。
